info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:55PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Berkshire, south central Bennington and southwestern Windham Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 555 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Readsboro, or 10 miles northeast of North Adams, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, penny size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads and in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... North Adams, Stamford, Readsboro, Florida, Whitingham, Jacksonville, Hairpin Turn, Whitcomb Summit, Readsboro Falls, Houghtonville, Savoy Center, Little Egypt, Eastern Summit, West Summit, Briggsville, Heartwellville, North Adams State College Athletic Field, Drury, East Renfrew and Bowens Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
